item.title: Why wouldn't you talk to users?
item.description: I’ve hear it said that the best code is the code you don’t write. The more code you have the more code that could have mistakes and that you have to remember how it works so you can maintain it. TDD and YAGNIÂ goes some way towards only writing the code you need, but how do you know what your tests should be in the first place? Involve your users
